product_name: Ibex El Fito Bib 3/4 Bike Tights - Men's
long_description: Breathe well and pedal well in the Ibex El Fito Bib 3/4 tights. Bibs allow for comfortable riding with the least constriction around your waist. Bikewear-exclusive fabric is made from New Zealand merino wool, a small amount of nylon for extra strength, and Lycra(R) spandex for a snug fit that moves with you. Wool provides excellent temperature regulation, especially for stop-and-go sports such as cycling; fabric blend is midweight, soft, durable, breathable and machine washable. Upper back and straps are made from a soft, breathable wool stretch-mesh fabric; it wicks moisture away from your body and dries quickly. Reinforced with flexible polyester/spandex fabric in the seat and inner thighs for durability and support; the fleecy brushed backing is extra soft next to skin. Bumps and vibrations are no problem for the multidensity foam pad; ergonomic pad absorbs sweat and dries quickly for comfort in the saddle. Soft-shell knee panels buffer against cold and wet weather and enhance warmth. Gripper elastic leg hems keeps tights in place. Soft-shell front knee panels buffer against cold and wet weather and enhance warmth. Ibex El Fito 3/4 Bibs have a reflective Ibex logo to boost your nighttime visibility.
short_description: Breathe well and pedal well in the Ibex El Fito Bib 3/4 tights. Bibs allow for comfortable riding with the least constriction around your waist.
